titleStmt.title: The state of the birth, temporal and spiritual and the duty and state of a child, youth, young-men, aged-men, and fathers in the truth : also, shewing that children are the heritage of the Lord, and that he hath glory in them / by George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
